title: fastmcp_rust breaking change: StreamableHttpTransport queue types switched to VecDeque
description:
Upstream fastmcp_rust introduced a breaking API change in StreamableHttpTransport queue helpers:

- request_queue(): Arc<Mutex<Vec<JsonRpcRequest>>> -> Arc<Mutex<VecDeque<JsonRpcRequest>>>
- response_queue(): Arc<Mutex<Vec<JsonRpcResponse>>> -> Arc<Mutex<VecDeque<JsonRpcResponse>>>

Why: dequeue operations were changed from O(n) Vec::remove(0) to O(1) VecDeque::pop_front for stream-load reliability.

Required migration in this repo:
1. Update explicit queue type annotations/imports to VecDeque.
2. Replace queue operations with VecDeque APIs (push_back, pop_front).
3. Re-run compile/tests for all MCP transport call-sites.

Reference upstream commit: 20ee715 in fastmcp_rust.
